name: KCEOC Community Action Partnership
description: KCEOC Community Action Partnership is a comprehensive social services organization serving Eastern Kentucky. They provide a wide range of programs and services to help low-income individuals and families achieve self-sufficiency. Services include emergency support, housing assistance, employment training, education programs, and community development initiatives. They are dedicated to recognizing human potential, improving communities, and creating opportunities for change.
source: Verified from official website and government databases
eligibility_requirements: Services primarily available to low-income individuals and families in Eastern Kentucky. Specific eligibility varies by program. Income guidelines apply for most services.
populations_served: Low-income families, children, elderly, disabled individuals, unemployed persons, homeless individuals
cost_information: Most services are free or low-cost. Some programs may have sliding scale fees based on income. Emergency services available regardless of ability to pay.
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://kceoc.org/contact/.
